# PED::IS_PED_RELOADING

## Summary
Checks if the ped is reloading

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns whether the specified ped is reloading.
